page.title: 12SMEATHARPE - TRANSPORT
page.content: Smeatharpe has no public transport. However a local private coach company runs a bus which passes through the village to Taunton every Friday. The Post Office runs a daily one-way service from Honiton to Smeatharpe with a Post Bus collecting mail from all the villages on the way. The free Hospital Car Service takes people who do not have their own transport to hospital clinic appoint- ments, chiropodist etc. Most people in Smeatharpe work in Exeter or Taunton and need a car to get there. Many wives at home have no transport during the day. A car is almost essential for recrea- tion, surgery visits and shopping in the towns. Otherwise, the residents who have none must rely on their neigh -bours for lifts. Some have bicycles and mopeds etc. for short trips.
